name: beefree-sdk-examples
description: Collection of Beefree SDK example projects

scripts.start:commenting: concurrently "cd commenting-example && yarn start" "cd secure-auth-example && yarn server:dev" --names "commenting,auth-server" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.start:custom-css: concurrently "cd custom-css-example && yarn start" "cd secure-auth-example && yarn server:dev" --names "custom-css,auth-server" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"

author: Beefree
